act: PRIVILEGES AND IMMUNITIES (COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES) ACT

type.name: section
type.title: Short title.
type.context: PRIVILEGES AND IMMUNITIES (COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES) ACT under Short title. 1. This  Act  may  be  cited  as  the  Privileges  and  Immunities (Commission of the European Communities)  Act.
type.description: This  Act  may  be  cited  as  the  Privileges  and  Immunities (Commission of the European Communities)  Act.

act: PRIVILEGES AND IMMUNITIES (COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES) ACT

type.name: section
type.title: Interpretation.
type.context: PRIVILEGES AND IMMUNITIES (COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES) ACT under Interpretation. 2.  In this Act Agreement means the Agreement between the Government of the Co-operative Republic of Guyana and the Commission of the European Communities the text of which is set out in the Schedule.
type.description: In this Act Agreement means the Agreement between the Government of the Co-operative Republic of Guyana and the Commission of the European Communities the text of which is set out in the Schedule.

act: PRIVILEGES AND IMMUNITIES (COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES) ACT

type.name: section
type.title: Incorporation of the European Communities.
type.context: PRIVILEGES AND IMMUNITIES (COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES) ACT under Incorporation of the European Communities. 3.  The European Communities shall be deemed to be a body corporate established by this Act.
type.description: The European Communities shall be deemed to be a body corporate established by this Act.

act: PRIVILEGES AND IMMUNITIES (COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES) ACT

type.name: section
type.title: [Omitted]  SCHEDULE  __________________________  28 of 1992  An Act to provide for the implementation of the Agreement between the Government of the Co-operative Republic of Guyana and the Commission of the European Communities and for purposes connected therewith.  [14TH NOVEMBER 1990] Short title.    Interpretation.      Incorporation of the European Communities.   Articles 2 and
type.context: PRIVILEGES AND IMMUNITIES (COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES) ACT under [Omitted]  SCHEDULE  __________________________  28 of 1992  An Act to provide for the implementation of the Agreement between the Government of the Co-operative Republic of Guyana and the Commission of the European Communities and for purposes connected therewith.  [14TH NOVEMBER 1990] Short title.    Interpretation.      Incorporation of the European Communities.   Articles 2 and 5. [Omitted]  SCHEDULE   Agreement  between  the  Government  of  the  Co-operative Republic of Guyana and the Commission of the European Communities  on  the  Establishment  and  on  the  Privileges  and Immunities of the Delegation of the Commission of the European Communities.  The Government of the Co-operative Republic of Guyana and the Commission of the European Communities.  Desirous of strengthening existing relations between the Co-operative Republic of Guyana and the European Communities and facilitating attainment   of   the   objectives   of   the   ACP-EEC  Co-operation Agreements, especially the Lome Convention.  Desirous of stipulating the terms governing the establishment on the Co-operative Republic of Guyana territory of a Delegation of the Commission of the European Communities (hereinafter referred to as the Commission) and its privileges and immunities.  Have agreed as follows:  ARTICLE 1  The Government of the Co-operative Republic of Guyana consents to the establishment of a Commission Delegation on Guyanas territory.   LAWS OF GUYANA                                  Privileges and Immunities                                   (Commission of the European Communities) Act Cap. 18:05 5  L.R.O. 1/2012  ARTICLE 2
type.description: [Omitted]  SCHEDULE   Agreement  between  the  Government  of  the  Co-operative Republic of Guyana and the Commission of the European Communities  on  the  Establishment  and  on  the  Privileges  and Immunities of the Delegation of the Commission of the European Communities.  The Government of the Co-operative Republic of Guyana and the Commission of the European Communities.  Desirous of strengthening existing relations between the Co-operative Republic of Guyana and the European Communities and facilitating attainment   of   the   objectives   of   the   ACP-EEC  Co-operation Agreements, especially the Lome Convention.  Desirous of stipulating the terms governing the establishment on the Co-operative Republic of Guyana territory of a Delegation of the Commission of the European Communities (hereinafter referred to as the Commission) and its privileges and immunities.  Have agreed as follows:  ARTICLE 1  The Government of the Co-operative Republic of Guyana consents to the establishment of a Commission Delegation on Guyanas territory.   LAWS OF GUYANA                                  Privileges and Immunities                                   (Commission of the European Communities) Act Cap. 18:05 5  L.R.O. 1/2012  ARTICLE 2
